column2: Göteborgs Tolkiensällskap.png|<small>Logo and heraldic device of Mithlond
Göteborgs Tolkiensällskap''' is the Swedish Tolkien Society of [[wikipedia:Gothenburg|Gothenburg]]. It was founded in [[1981]]
column3: hived off from [[Forodrim]]. The association publishes ''[[Elostirion (magazine)|Elostirion]]''.

column1: Mithlond is composed of several guilds
column2: each devoted to a specific task. These inlude languages
